identified-content.object.title: Advertising (Times Column)
identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Marketing, Advertising and PR

abstract.p: Roundup of recent advertising account changes (S)ï¿½

block.p: Jamaica Tourist Board, Kingston, decided after a required review to keep Foote Cone & Belding, New York, part of the Interpublic Group of Companies, as agency of record on its account for another three years. Billings were estimated at $15 million.
Yahoo, Sunnydale, Calif., to OgilvyOne, New York, part of the Ogilvy & Mather Worldwide division of the WPP Group, to handle the interactive part of its account. Spending has not been determined.

Jamaica Tourist Board, Kingston, decided after a required review to keep Foote Cone & Belding, New York, part of the Interpublic Group of Companies, as agency of record on its account for another three years. Billings were estimated at $15 million.
Yahoo, Sunnydale, Calif., to OgilvyOne, New York, part of the Ogilvy & Mather Worldwide division of the WPP Group, to handle the interactive part of its account. Spending has not been determined.
Beazer Homes, Atlanta, a home builder, to Fitzgerald & Company, Atlanta, part of the Interpublic Group of Companies, as agency of record. Spending was estimated at $10 million.
